CON: The Bugfender SDK collects the following details automatically. only in Android
text: Security and compliance. The Bugfender SDK collects the following details automatically: Device make and model,  Operating system name (iOS/Android) and version,  Language the device is configured in,  Device name (only in Android: either a developer-defined string or the device hostname).. Additionally, you may choose to collect (all of these are optional): Custom device key-values, such as identifiers to locate the specific device of a user,  User interactions with your application,  Application crash stacktraces,  Any other user activity or internal application state.
